mapper.select: SELECT t.id id,t.`name` name,t.buy_price price,pic.path thumbPictures FROM t_product t LEFT JOIN t_product_picture pic on t.id=pic.product_id AND pic.type=0 where t.status=2
SELECT count(t.id) FROM t_product t LEFT JOIN t_product_picture pic on t.id=pic.product_id AND pic.type=0 where t.status=2

SELECT t.id id,t.`name` name,t.buy_price buyPrice,p.imageUrls middlePictures,p1.imageUrls largePictures,t.quantity quantity FROM t_product t LEFT JOIN (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(path ORDER BY sort_no ASC) imageUrls, product_id FROM t_product_picture WHERE type = 2 GROUP BY product_id) p ON p.product_id= t.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(path ORDER BY sort_no ASC) imageUrls, product_id FROM t_product_picture WHERE type = 1 GROUP BY product_id) p1 ON p1.product_id= t.id where t.id=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
